Class Format

java.lang.Object
  com.sonic.as_storage_java.Volume
      com.sonic.as_storage_java.Format
Direct Known Subclasses:
Audio
public class Format
extends Volume

This class manages all of the volume format related functions.

Author:
vijaya_lashkari
